title: LDWorkbenchConfiguration
description: JSON Schema for LDWorkbench, it helps with the writing of the configuration needed to run LDWorkbench pipelines.

description.description: An optional description for your pipeline.

iterator.description: Path (prefixed with "file://") or SPARQL Query that makes the iterator using SPARQL select.

generator.description: Path (prefixed with "file://") or SPARQL Query that makes the generator using SPARQL construct.

endpoint.description: The SPARQL enspoint for the iterator.

target.description: The file where the results are saved.
